citation: Cal. Civ. Proc. Code ยง 1161
title: Grounds for Eviction
text: A landlord may evict a tenant for reasons such as non-payment of rent, violation of the lease agreement, or damage to the property.

citation: Cal. Civ. Proc. Code ยง 1162
title: Notice Requirements for Eviction
text: Landlords must provide tenants with proper notice before starting eviction proceedings.  The type and length of notice vary depending on the reason for eviction.

question: What is an unlawful detainer?
answer: An unlawful detainer is a lawsuit filed by a landlord to evict a tenant.
